channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 20 Years Ago, RedState Was Brand New...and I Was a Liberal - Now Look at Us
Democrats spotlight Biden alter-ego 'Dark Brandon' as they launch billboards near GOP convention
item.description: As GOP delegates, officials, activists and supporters head to day 2 of the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee, Democrats launch billboards spotlighting President Biden's alter-ego: Dark Brandon.

item.title: Biden: Focus on Trump 'Lies,' Not My Debate Performance
item.description: President Joe Biden said Monday he made a mistake when he told supporters to put rival Donald Trump in a "bulls-eye," but said Trump regularly employed rhetoric that was inflammatory and lied repeatedly at their debate last month.

item.title: WATCH: David Sacks Torches Biden-Harris Adminstration, Gives Compelling Case to Vote for Trump-Vance
Former Trump primary rival Haley in Republican convention spotlight on day after JD Vance named running mate
item.description: One day after Donald Trump was formally nominated as the GOP's 2024 presidential nominee and named Sen. JD Vance as running mate, Nikki Haley takes center stage at the Republican National Convention

item.title: Bandaged Trump Gets Hero's Welcome Walking Out on Day 1 at RNC
item.description: Donald Trump made a triumphant entrance to cap the first day of the Republican National Convention, receiving a raucous ovation from the party faithful days after surviving an assassination attempt that has reshaped the presidential contest.

item.title: Donald Trump Makes Powerful Appearance at First Night of Republican National Convention
JD Vance brings a wealth of experience from Silicon Valley to the campaign, White House
item.description: The GOP vice presidential nominee is only a freshman senator, but has years of experience outside the political arena that is likely to boost the Republican ticket in November.

item.title: Crowd Erupts As Trump Appears at GOP Convention
item.description: Showing a warrior's resolve, former President Donald Trump appeared at the Republican National Convention in Milwaukee on Monday night, just two days after he dodged an assassin's bullet during a rally in Butler, Pennsylvania.

item.title: REPORT: Police Spotted Trump Rally Shooter Nearly a Half Hour Before Shots, and It Gets Worse
Kamala Harris congratulates JD Vance, hopes 'that the two can meet' at VP debate
item.description: Kamala Harris called JD Vance to congratulate him on being selected as former President Trump's running mate, and also to express hope they can meet face to face for a debate.

item.title: College Suspends Instructor for Assassination Attempt Post
item.description: Bellarmine University on Monday suspended an instructor who made an "offensive and unacceptable social media post" related to the assassination attempt on former President Donald Trump over the weekend, the school's assistant vice president said in a post.

item.title: SC's Tim Scott Brings 'The Spirit' to the 2024 Republican National Convention
JD Vance, once a Never Trumper, is the VP pick to shape MAGAâ€™s future
item.description: Iraq veteran and Sen. JD Vance was selected to be Donald Trump's VP pick on Monday afternoon. Will the senator from Ohio bolster the ticket in the 2024 election?

item.title: Secret Service Agrees to Independent Probe
item.description: Facing growing criticism over a massive security failure, the US Secret Service on Monday vowed to cooperate with an independent review after a shooter was allowed to open fire on Donald Trump.The 78-year-old former president was injured but survived an assassination...
